title: Nature Domain
content: Action Summon a giant vine capable of dragging creatures toward itself. 10 Turns 9m Concentration GUARDIAN OF FAITH Lv 4 Conjuration Action Call forth a divine guardian that attacks nearby enemies. Every time it deals damage, the guardian loses an equal amount of hit points. 10 Turns 9m ICE STORM Lv 4 Evocation Action 6-40 Damage 2d8 Bludgeoning+4d6 Cold Impel a storm of hail and ice to crash from the sky, covering the ground and striking all objects and creatures within range. 2 TurnsOn Save:
